channel.title: Server.Class Error?
channel.description: When i run my server with Mod Taharok's Perfect Compiler 1.9 it says that "You do not have a Server.Class. Make sure you have used the compiler while running it." i dont under stand that. Any help for me guys??please :confused:

item.title: Server.Class Error?
item.dc:creator: @04rsxs 04rsxs
item.description:
@04rsxs wrote:

If you have no Java files then you certainly can’t run anything.

Java files are the entire makeup of a server, you need to go to the source list and download some and find one you like.

There are several good tutorials for creating a server in the tutorial section.

Read full topic

item.title: Server.Class Error?
item.dc:creator: @shadow235 shadow235
item.description:
@shadow235 wrote:

It just means when you run the compiler. You need to type C

Then type

R or run or whatever it is.

Read full topic

item.title: Server.Class Error?
item.dc:creator: @ojontrial ojontrial
item.description:
@ojontrial wrote:

PatScape:

You have to compile first. Hit “c” at the start of the compiler. compiling .java files creates .class duplicates, which are readable by java programs.

When i do that it says "you must have java files for this compiler to compile.[br][size=1]Posted on: June 08, 2007, 09:43:48 PM[/size][hr]also i forgot to tell you im a beginner… :|[br][size=1]Posted on: June 08, 2007, 09:44:22 PM[/size][hr]nobody?..great…

Read full topic
